Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Statuette of Reshef
Description: Statuette of the god Reshef. He is naked but for the conical cap that he wears on his head. His right arm is bent double in an upward direction and the hand is perforated because he used to carry a lance which is now lost. The other arm is bent forward, once supporting a shield which has also disappeared. On the back is an incision running from the head to the legs.
